text: The Aberfan disaster occurred on 21 October 1966.1966: Aberfan - a generation wiped out It was the collapse of a colliery spoil tip onto the village of Aberfan in Glamorgan, Wales. It killed 144 people, most of them children. ==References== Category:1966 in the United Kingdom Category:Disasters in the United Kingdom Category:Glamorgan Category:History of Wales
title: Aberfan disaster
